summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 45th Avenue South, from Brandon Street, to Bennett Street; and certain parts of certain other street, by grading, graveling, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8085 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
